comment: 这个文件是想把词条的空格规范统一，更贴近中文习惯。如果有要修正的文本，别忘了在这里deprecate掉。
conventions: 名词两边无空格，数字两边有空格。若一个参数既可以是名词也可以是数字，按数字算。

Every %1 current players on Steam genera.english:
Every %1 current players on Steam generates 1 herald, up to %2 heralds.
Each herald gives everyone +1% CpS.
Every %1 current players on Steam genera.chinese:
Steam上的每%1个当前玩家生成1个先驱者，最多%2个先驱者。
每个先驱者给每个人+1%的CpS。

The cost of switching your aura is <b>%1.english:
The cost of switching your aura is %1.
This will affect your CpS!
The cost of switching your aura is <b>%1.chinese:
你需要消耗 %1 才能切换光环。
这会影响你的每秒饼干产量！

You've been on this run for <b>%1</b>..english: You've been on this run for %1.

Upgrade for %1.comment: StockMarket里消耗指针升级什么东西，可能是错的

You can also press %1 to bulk-buy or sel.english: You can also press %1 to bulk-buy or sell %2 of a building at a time, or %3 for %4.
You can also press %1 to bulk-buy or sel.chinese: 你也可以按 %1 批量购买或出售 %2 个建筑，或按 %3 批量购买或出售 %4 个。

The mouse and cursors gain <b>+%1</b> co.english: The mouse and cursors gain +%1 cookies for each non-cursor building owned.
The mouse and cursors gain <b>+%1</b> co.chinese: 每拥有 1 个非指针建筑，鼠标点击和指针生产的饼干 +%1。

Each %1 gains <b>+%2 base CpS per %3</b>.chinese: 每个%1 按照每 %3 个获得 +%2 基础CpS。

You've pledged to the elders <b>%1 times.comment: 没怎么见过中文数字，换成阿拉伯数字保持统一
english: You've pledged to the elders %1 times.
chinese: 你与老奶奶订立誓约 1 次。
你与老奶奶订立誓约 %1 次。

Golden cookies appear <b>%1%</b> more of.english: Golden cookies appear %1% more often during %2.
Golden cookies appear <b>%1%</b> more of.chinese: 黄金饼干在%2期间的出现频率增加 %1%。

You've switched seasons <b>%1 times</b>.english: You've switched seasons %1 times this ascension.
You've switched seasons <b>%1 times</b>.chinese: 你本次飞升切换过%1 次节日。

You gain another <b>+%1%</b> of your reg.english: You gain another +%1% of your regular CpS while the game is closed, for a total of %2%.
You gain another <b>+%1%</b> of your reg.chinese: 游戏关闭时，你又获得正常CpS的 +%1%，总计 %2%。

You start with <b>%1</b>..chinese: 为你提供 %1 作为初始装备。

You retain optimal cookie production whi.english: You retain optimal cookie production while the game is closed for %1 more days.
You retain optimal cookie production whi.chinese: 你在游戏关闭后可继续保持最优饼干产量，持续时间延长 %1 天。

Cost scales with CpS, but %1 times cheap.english: Cost scales with CpS, but %1 times cheaper with a fully-trained dragon.
Cost scales with CpS, but %1 times cheap.chinese: 花费视 CpS 而定，如果有经过充分训练的龙，可以便宜 %1 倍。

Dragon harvest and Dragonflight are <b>%.english: Dragon harvest and Dragonflight are %1% stronger.
Dragon harvest and Dragonflight are <b>%.chinese: 飞龙收获和飞龙在天的效果增强 %1%。

Golden and wrath cookie effect duration.english: Golden and wrath cookie effect duration +%1%.
Golden and wrath cookie effect duration.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干效果持续时间 +%1%。

Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干多出现增加 1%。

Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干多出现减少 1%。

Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every bui.english: Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every building sold for %2 seconds.
Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every bui.chinese: 增益状态在 %2秒内每卖出一座建筑，就增加 %1% 的点击量。

CpS bonus fluctuating between %1 and %2.english: CpS bonus fluctuating between %1 and %2 over time.
CpS bonus fluctuating between %1 and %2.chinese: CpS奖励随时间在 %1 和 %2 之间波动。

Effect cycles over %1 hours..chinese: 效果周期超过 %1 小时。

Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %.english: Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %2% more cookies.
Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %.chinese: 饼干虫出现速度加快了 %1%，消化饼干的数量增加了 %2%。

Click on the news ticker <b>%1 times</b>.english: Click on the news ticker %1 times.

%1 to harvest only mature, mortal plants.english: %1 to harvest only mature, mortal plants.
%1 to harvest only mature, mortal plants.chinese: 按 %1 只收获成熟的、死亡的植物。

%1 to harvest all mature plants of this.english: %1 to harvest all mature plants of this type.
%1 to harvest all mature plants of this.chinese: 按 %1 以收获此类型的所有成熟植物。

A swarm of sugar hornets comes down on y.english:
A swarm of sugar hornets comes down on your garden, destroying every plant as well as every seed you've unlocked - leaving only a %1 seed.
In exchange, they will grant you %2.
This action is only available with a complete seed log.
A swarm of sugar hornets comes down on y.chinese:
一群糖黄蜂来到你的花园里，摧毁了你解锁的每一棵植物和每一颗种子 - 只留下 %1 颗种子。
作为交换，它们将给你你%2。
这个操作只有在完整的种子日志中才可用。

Do you REALLY want to sacrifice your gar.english:
Do you REALLY want to sacrifice your garden to the sugar hornets?
You will be left with an empty plot and only the %1 seed unlocked.
In return, you will gain %2 sugar lumps.
Do you REALLY want to sacrifice your gar.chinese:
你真的想把你的花园牺牲给糖黄蜂吗？
你将得到一块空地，只有 %1 颗种子被解锁。
作为回报，你将获得 %2 个糖块。

You've sacrificed your garden to the sug.english:
You've sacrificed your garden to the sugar hornets, destroying your crops and your knowledge of seeds.
In the remains, you find %1 sugar lumps.
You've sacrificed your garden to the sug.chinese:
你为了糖蜂牺牲了自己的花园，毁坏了你的庄稼和你对种子的了解。
在残留物中，你发现了 %1 个糖块。

surrounding plants (%1x%1) age %2% faste.chinese: 周围植物 (%1x%1) 老化速度加快 %2%

surrounding plants (%1x%1) age %2% slowe.chinese: 周围植物 (%1x%1) 老化速度减慢 %2%

surrounding plants (%1x%1) are %2% more.chinese: 周围植物 (%1x%1) 效率提高 %2%

surrounding plants (%1x%1) are %2% less.chinese: 周围植物 (%1x%1) 效率降低 %2

surrounding tiles (%1x%1) develop no wee.english: surrounding tiles (%1x%1) develop no weeds or fungus
surrounding tiles (%1x%1) develop no wee.chinese: 周围格子 (%1x%1) 没有出现杂草或真菌

explodes into up to %1 of CpS at the end.english: explodes into up to %1 of CpS at the end of its lifecycle (max. %2% of bank)
explodes into up to %1 of CpS at the end.chinese: 在其生命周期结束时，最多会爆发成CpS的 %1（最大为银行的 %2%）

cannot handle cold climates; %1% chance.english: cannot handle cold climates; %1% chance to die when frozen
cannot handle cold climates; %1% chance.chinese: 无法应对寒冷气候；冻结时有 %1% 的几率死亡

Soil unlocked at %1 farms..chinese: 在 %1 个农场解锁土壤。

You will be able to change your soil aga.english: You will be able to change your soil again in %1.
You will be able to change your soil aga.chinese: 你可以在 %1 中再次更改你的土壤。
